definitions.definition: move at a regular and fairly slow pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn, never having both feet off the ground at once.
synonyms: hoof it; formalperambulate "they walked along the road"

definitions.definition: use movements similar to walking but with a different part of one's body or a support.
examples: he could walk on his hands, carrying a plate on one foot

definitions.definition: go on foot for recreation and exercise.
examples: you can walk in 21,000 acres of mountain and moorland

definitions.definition: travel along or over (a route or area) on foot.
examples: the police department has encouraged officers to walk the beat

definitions.definition: (of a quadruped) proceed with the slowest gait, always having at least two feet on the ground at once.
ride (a horse) at its slowest gait.
examples: he walked his horse toward her

definitions.definition: abandon or suddenly withdraw from a job, commitment, or situation.
examples: they can walk away from the deal

definitions.definition: be released from suspicion or from a charge.
examples: had any of the others come clean during the trial, he might have walked

definitions.definition: used to suggest that someone has achieved a state or position easily or undeservedly.
examples: no one has the right to walk straight into a well-paid job for life

definitions.definition: (of a ghost) be present and visible.
examples: the ghosts of Bannockburn walked abroad

definitions.definition: used to describe the way in which someone lives or behaves.
be awarded first base after not swinging at four balls pitched outside the strike zone.
allow or enable (a batter) to do this.
(of a pitcher) give a walk with the bases loaded so as to force in (a run).
another term for travel (sense 2 of the verb).
cause or enable (someone or something) to walk or move as though walking.
examples: she walked her fingers over the dresses

definitions.definition: guide, accompany, or escort (someone) on foot.
examples: he walked her home to her door

definitions.definition: take (a domestic animal, typically a dog) out for exercise.
push (a bicycle or motorcycle) while walking alongside it.
